reviews.customers_say: Customers find this cardigan well-made and chic, with many colors to choose from and a heavier fabric than expected that hangs beautifully.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars High Quality
items.body: Love this 'Coatigan"! I ordered a small in black (5'3", 133 lbs) which is a perfect fit for me. It looks much more expensive than the price. It comes in several colors and I plan to order another color in the future. The fabric is slightly heavy so is perfect for early spring and fall and even mild winter days. I recently wore it on a plane and in the Northeast weather and it was perfect. It looks very dressy but also works with casual clothing. Read more
items.author: Shan S.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Well worth it.
items.body: I love this coat-sweater. It is so comfortable and warm. It feels good when you put it on. Just snugly. The quality of the knit is what I’m impressed with. It is heavy and tightly knit and the yarn is great. I like the design…straight and simple. Where with anything, even jeans. There really isn’t anything that I can find wrong with it. I think I might have to buy another. I give my highest recommendation for this coatigan. Love it! Read more
items.author: SandraK

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Warm, Stylish and Soft
items.body: I really like this long cardigan. The yarn is on the heavier side so the seater is soft and warm, and can be worn as a jacket on cooler days. The fabric has some stretch to it yet it is on the larger side. The tan color is really nice and versatile and looks great with dress pants, leggings or jeans and over a dress or skirt. The pockets on the sweater a really nice and well sewn. The seater it self is washable. I washed it on gentle and hung to dry without any damage, shrinkage are tears. The sweater was long on my 5’3” frame and came down to just past my knees. I found that sizing down gave me a better fit all around especially in the flap collar area and the sleeves. Essentially, the is a high quality, soft elevated sweated to keep you warm in the cooler months. Recommend! Read more
items.author: sailfishes

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great buy, you will love it!
items.body: Love this Cardigan! I received my cardigan yesterday and hung it up to let some of the wrinkles out. Then i tried it on today and I have to say, I love it! I ordered a large and debated for a minute sending it back to get an extra large, but I am keeping it as I do want it to fall open a little bit. It fits well in the shoulders and across my bust. I ordered the light brown which is a really great color for me and I have many items that this will go with. I can't wait to wear it. It is soft and well made and heavier than I expected and I just know I'm going to get a lot of use out of it. It's classic and that means I will be wearing this for many years, probably decades Read more
items.author: Yay or Nay

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great quality and style!
items.body: This open cardigan was such a good surprise, and I am looking to order another one! Great quality and fit - I did size down. I normally wear an XL but sized down to a Large. I can comfortably wear a shirt under this and it is not tight. It is a heavier weight material. Just a great item that can be dressed classy or casual. I will say the Khaki color I ordered has a slight pink tone to it, not a tan tone that Khaki normally is. Read more
items.author: Bookish Bee

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars ANRABESS is excellent quality---I've bought many of their things and am always HAPPY!!
items.body: I have bought a number of Anrabess items and find them to be very well made, very affordable and in beautiful materials and colors. I think these are made in China and unfortunately way too many things made there are NOT made well, especiall the finishing details. But this company gets it right every time. I LOVE LOVE LOVE this sweater jacket. Its a classic and simple but great design to dress up or down. I bought it in this yellow, which is really a fabulous mustard and in Nutmeg. It doesn't quite close on me but its well fitting and I think the idea is for it to fall open in front as the pictures indicate. I wore it to lunch on Friday and got sooo many compliments from women of all ages and even a man! Wore it with my mustard shoulder bag, mustard necklace, dark gray body suit, jeans and dark grey suede shoes Read more
items.author: Susan

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great purchase.
items.body: Spouse review. Loved it! I hesitated to purchase, but glad I did. Length is perfect, it comes down just right above the knee. I typically wear a size L, but reading all the reviews, I purchased a Medium. I will definitely be purchasing other colors. Good material for the price. It's nice and soft, good fabric and not too heavy. Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great quality for the price.
items.body: What a great cardigan! The color is beautiful,the fit is perfect and the price is even better. The fabric is warm and not to heavy. If you’re looking for a gift for someone this would be great! Looks and feels very expensive. Read more
items.author: Customer

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Brown, Red Brown, Olive Green, Rose, Army Green, Deep Gray, Orange Rust, Black, Peachy Khaki, Apricort, Beige, Light Brown, Sky Blue, Gray. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
